awoo.description: Start a howl, or join in!

<@!{0}> joined a howl with {1} furs!
Join in using `{2}awoo`.
{3}

awoo.start:
<@!{0}> started a howl!
Join in using `{1}awoo`.
{2}
awoo.alreadyPresent: you are already in this howl!

possible: <@!{0}> smacks {1} hard on the snoot with a rolled up news paper!
<@!{0}> goes to smack {1} on the snoot with a news paper, but missed and hit themself!
<@!{0}> goes to smack {1} on the snoot with a news paper, but missed and hit {2}

bellyrub.description: Give someone a nice belly rub -w-

possible:
<@!{0}> lightly pokes the nose of {1}!
OwO

conga.description: Start a conga with someone, or join in!
conga.join:
<@!{0}> joined a conga with {1} other furs!
There are now {3} furs in this conga!
Join in using `{2}conga`
{4}
conga.tooLarge: This conga is too large for emojis!
conga.start:
<@!{0}> started a conga with <@!{1}>!
Join in using `{2}conga`.
{3}{3}
conga.alreadyPresent: you are already in this conga!
conga.noSelf: you cannot start a conga with yourself!

possible:
<@!{0}> sneaks up behind {1} and cuddles them
Isn't that sweet

dice.minLess: the minimum must be less than the maximum.

dictionary.description: Throw a dictionary at someone to teach them some knowledge!
possible: <@!{0}> drops some knowledge on {1}, with their dictionary!
<@!{0}> drops their entire english folder onto {1}, it seems to have flattened them!

divorce.notMarried: you have to marry someone before you can divorce them..
divorce.confirm: Are you sure you want to divorce **{0}**? **yes** or **no**.

e926.description: Get some content from E926 (SFW E621)!
e926.maxTags: you can only specify up to fourty (40) tags.
e926.flash: This post is a flash animation, please directly view [the post]({0}) on e926
e926.video: This post appears to be a video, please directly view [the post]({0}) on e926
e926.navigate:
To navigate posts, you can reply with one of the following:
**first**, **back**, **stop**, **next**, **last**.
e926.ratelimited: you are being ratelimited! Please wait a bit more for navigating posts.
e926.inactive: Navigating not active, it either timed out or the started exited.

furpile.description: Start a furpile on someone, or join in!
furpile.join:
<@!{0}> joined a furpile with {1} other furs!
This furpile now has {2} furs in it!
Join in using `{3}furpile`
furpile.tooLarge: This furpile is too large for emojis!
furpile.start:
<@!{0}> started a furpile on <@!{1}>!
Join in using `{2}furpile`.
furpile.alreadyPresent: you are already in this furpile!
furpile.noSelf: you cannot start a furpile on yourself!

marry.title: Marriage Proposal
marry.content:
<@!{0}> has proposed to <@!{1}>!
<@!{1}> do you accept? **yes** or **no**.
marry.noReply: Seems like we didn't get a reply..
marry.devOnly: Only developers may use the "force" option.

weirdedit.description: Make a message with a weird little edit thing.
weirdedit.missing0: First text missing. You must provide some text separated by commas.
weirdedit.missing1: Second text missing. You must provide some text separated by commas.
weirdedit.edited: This message will be edited soon.
